name: Xuemeng Song
content: Welcome to Song Xuemeng's Homepage Xuemeng Song Associate Professor Department of Computer Science and Engineering Southern University of Science and Technology Address： Office 618, South Tower, CoE Building, SUSTech, 1088 Xueyuan Avenue, Nanshan District, Shenzhen, China Email： sxmustc at gmail dot com News Biography Awards Services Publications Research News Opening for master/PhD students: I am recruiting self-motivated master/PhD students, postdocs, and RAs to collaborate on research domains such as multimodal learning and multimodal large language models. (Enrollment of 2026 Sep). Biography Xuemeng Song is an associate professor at Southern University of Science and Technology, and IEEE senior member. She got her PhD degree from National University of Singapore (NUS) and her Bachelor degree from Universitiy of Science and Technology of China (USTC) in 2016 and 2012, respectively. Her research interests are multimodal learning and multimodal large language models. She has published more than 90 papers in the top venues (e.g., IEEE TIP, IEEE TMM, ACM SIGIR, ACM MM, and ACM TOIS) and 4 books by Morgan & Claypool Publishers and Springer. In addition, she has served as reviewers for many top conferences and journals, such as TKDD, TMM, ICMR, and MMM.
